name: Creepy Crawly Crush
description:
In "Creepy Crawly Crush", your objective is to earn as many points as possible by stomping on bugs and mushrooms. The game is inspired by "Centipede" and features arcade-style gameplay. The higher the number of consecutive jumps on insects and mushrooms, the higher your combo score will be. Can you achieve the highest score?

Created for GDKO Round 4 with the task to recreate the classic arcade game "Centipede" in your own style.

Credits

  • Game and Art by Loten

Music

  • “Destiny Day” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  • “Odyssey” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  • “Figuring It All Out” Teknoaxe (teknoaxe.com)

Sound Effects

  • Sound effects obtained from zapsplat.com
  • Additional sound effects obtained from gamemasteraudio.com
